['We are seeking an experienced Junior QA Engineer to join our fintech team. As a QA Engineer, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the quality and reliability of our FinTech software product. You‚Äôll collaborate with cross-functional teams, execute test plans, and contribute to the overall success of our projects.
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
Analyze customer requirements, and design requirements to determine the test requirements of the project;
Developing detailed test cases to increase test coverage across each feature;
Carry out tests based on test cases and assess the status of test cases;
Clearly and confidently document, report, and present test results to internal teams, external partners, and clients;
Possessing communication skills to effectively convey testing requirements and strategies, working closely with the development team to provide the best quality.
Providing ideas to improve the project.
K·ªπ nƒÉng & Chuy√™n m√¥n
1.5+ years of testing experience in software development projects.
Mastery in manual exploratory testing of progressively more complex web development projects (including mobile) 
Mastery in documenting and managing defects in specialized software (preference is Notion)
Able to clearly and confidently document, report, and present test results to internal teams, external partners, and client stakeholders
Exposure and/or experience to test in multiple specializations: accessibility, usability, load and performance, security, creative technology, or native mobile apps.
Experience in testing API, running collection, and test scripts using Postman.
Fluent English communication skill is a plus.
Knowledge of automation is a plus.
Passion and creativity are the plus things
Ph√∫c l·ª£i d√†nh cho b·∫°n
Learning newest technologies
13-month salary per year
Social ‚Äì Health ‚Äì Insurance paid fully
Flexible option bonus for good performers']

V·ªÅ ch√∫ng t√¥i
Rexy Technology is a software development company in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. We are a strong team made up of young people with enthusiasm and potential.
As part of our innovative nature, we constantly research the state of the art technology, experiment, and apply it to our product development process.

["We are looking for Infrastructure Engineer who can steadily manage Cloud Environments. Initially, you will assist in one / two of our projects as a team member. At this stage, our main responsibility is to ensure the service level and continuity of the existing system for the purpose of supporting & assisting customer‚Äôs future business growth. We also have an opportunity to proceed with IT Infrastructure Integration / design and build a new IT Environment with Public Cloud Service and new technologies. 
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
Stabilize and improve the existing customer' environment. 
Install, configure, test and maintain operating systems, middleware using management tools & automated infrastructure daily basis to minimize downtime on customer activities. 
Monitor and test application performance to identify potential bottlenecks, design solutions, and work with developers to implement those fixes. 
Write and maintain custom scripts to increase system efficiency and reduce the human intervention time on any tasks. 
Provide 1st and 2nd level support for system / security alerts. 
Maintaining documents, procedures and technical guides. 
Report to the Team Leader and Manager about activities and projects.
K·ªπ nƒÉng & Chuy√™n m√¥n
5 years of IT experience. 
3+ years as system administrator with experience in WEB Systems design, development, middleware installation, configuration, performance tuning, troubleshooting, 24x7x365 operation & maintenance. 
At least 1 year working in an international company with multi-sites. 
Strong knowledge Microsoft Azure cloud management, Microsoft Intune hands-on experience. Active Directory, Web server,... 
Networking TCP/IP, DNS, Routing,... 
Experienced with one of monitoring tools: Zabbix, Grafana, AWS Cloudwatch, elastics search, Kibana,‚Ä¶ 
Patching and package management, users and permissions. Experienced with Disks, LVM and file systems, OS-level networking. 
Customer oriented approach. 
Good communication skills (written / verbal) in English. 
Can work independently and team-work as well.
Nice to have 
ITIL Certification/ knowledge. 
Experience with Cyber Security Role. 
Experience with IT Infrastructure Integration/ Migration. 
Experience with automation software such as Docker, Terraform, Kubernetes. 
Experience with Data Warehouse on cloud and IoT core system. 
Experience with scripting skills such as Python, Ruby, Perl, shell scripts. 
Experienced with Japanese culture.
Ph√∫c l·ª£i d√†nh cho b·∫°n
Performance review 2 times per year.
Premium Health Insurance package (PVI)
13th-month salary
Leave Paid: Summer holiday, Company birthday, Annual Leave (max 24days)
Care programs: Wedding, Close family pass away, Giving Birth, Premium Insurance.
Free Drinking: Coffee, Tea, Milk & Beer.
Work-Life Balance: Baby care time policy for staffs have kids.
Annual health checkup
Online training courses
Summer Holidays
Global, friendly environment. We use English in our office.
Employee Relationship: company trip, monthly team building
Time working: 08:30 - 17:30 from Monday to Friday."]

["The role in as part of the APAC Data & Analytics Hub within the D&T department of HEINEKEN International is critical in Heineken to operationalise our strategy of standardised and scalable data foundations across the region and enterprise. 
The role holder will work with colleagues across Heineken as part of a team that structure the entire process of data extraction, transformation, and storage using serverless Azure services to deploy models and analytical solutions for the enterprise within a specific Function (or a group of Functions). 
It is essential that the role holder can manage quality assurance, data migration and integration, and solution deployment to ensure the business gets the best value. This will be achieved by building strong relationships and collaboration with members of the broader HEINEKEN data organisation as well as various programs across the central, regional and Operating Company (OpCo) structures. 
In particular, he/she will partner with a growing group of data professionals such as Data Scientists, Machine Learning Engineers and Product Managers who play a crucial role in the development and delivery of Analytics products at scale.
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
All Levels (scope and complexity will increase from single product and domain to multiple products and/or domains).
Structure end-to-end processes of data extraction, transformation, and storage to deploy models and analytical solutions in real-time and offline analytic processing.
Handle activities such as quality assurance, data migration and integration, and solution deployment to ensure the business gets the best value.
Implement, maintain, and further develop ETL processes, data lineage, and observability across large-scale data ingestion from a variety of sources.
Design and implement data flows to ensure efficient and reliable data movement (e.g., unit and integration tests).
Provide technical support in understanding business problems and designing smart data products.
Collaborate within an agile culture, contributing to the team's success.
Maintain strong relationships with stakeholders to ensure collaboration and delivery of objectives (Relationship creation and management of broader team‚Äôs stakeholders to ensure strong connection and collaboration for team).
Continued self-development and research of best-in-class analytical approached (management and/or development and capability building of Junior/Senior Data Engineers).
Potential responsibility for selection of AA Vendors and AA Tooling workbench (Procurement & Enablement of tools sits with GIS).
K·ªπ nƒÉng & Chuy√™n m√¥n
Qualifications:
BA/MSc in Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field; equivalent work experience accepted. (MSc/PhD)
3+ years in a pure analytical/science role (5+ years)
Experience / Skills (all levels): 
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Significant commercial experience in a similar position.
Proficiency with Python (inc. strong data analytics skills using Python).
Excellent software engineering skills (including unit testing, integration testing, OOP).
Experience working with large datasets through Spark and RDBMS.
Solid knowledge of PySpark with the ability to apply it to write Spark applications as well as analyze data in a distributed environment.
Experience working with a large development team (CI/CD).
Very good SQL skills and ability to extract information from databases.
Ability to build and maintain strong collaborative relationships with stakeholders across the business.
Demonstrated ability to effectively manage multiple simultaneous projects and deliverables.
Communicate effectively with various stakeholders, tailoring your message to your audience's level of technical understanding
Nice to have:
Experience with Azure development environment
Experience in building/releasing Infrastructure as Code (e.g., Terraform).
Experience with containerization technologies and orchestrators (e.g., Docker and Kubernetes).
Understanding of machine learning models, deployment, and monitoring.
Interest in machine learning and/or desire to develop skills.
Experience working in agile organizations.
Excellent written and verbal English.
Ph√∫c l·ª£i d√†nh cho b·∫°n
A diverse and open working culture, where your true identity is celebrated.
Multiple career opportunities to rotate within Functions or cross-functions.
Your wellbeing will be taken care by our Health & Safety Team since Day 1.
Be a part of our sustainability journey in Brewing the Better Vietnam.
Performance appraisal twice a year to guarantee constructive feedback
Performance bonus (estimated at least 3 months) and 13th month salary bonus
Bao Viet Insurance for employees and family
Annual leave: 18 days/year
Flexible benefit voucher
80% lunch in canteen
Annual team building, Town hall, YEP

["As a Senior Scrum Coordinator, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring the smooth and efficient execution of Scrum projects within our organization. You will be responsible for coordinating Scrum events, managing project backlogs, and facilitating effective communication between team members and stakeholders.
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
Scrum Event Coordination: Facilitate and manage all Scrum events, including Sprint Planning, Daily Scrums, Sprint Reviews, and Retrospectives.

Team Facilitation: Foster a collaborative and productive team environment by facilitating effective communication, conflict resolution, and decision-making.
Stakeholder Management: Liaise with stakeholders to gather requirements, manage expectations, and ensure their satisfaction with project outcomes.
Metrics and Reporting: Track project progress, analyze key metrics, and provide regular reports to stakeholders.
Continuous Improvement: Identify opportunities for process improvement and implement best practices to enhance team efficiency and effectiveness.

Strong fluency in English is a must
Minimum 2+ years of experience as a Scrum Coordinator or Scrum Master
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Business Administration, or related field.
Proven experience as a Scrum Coordinator or similar role.
Strong understanding of Agile methodologies, particularly Scrum and Kanban.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Open-mindedness and willingness to learn: Ability to accept feedback, adapt to new approaches, and continuously develop your skills.
Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.
Strong organizational and time management skills.
Proficiency in project management tools and software.
Scrum Master certification (CSM, PSM, or equivalent) preferred.

15 days of annual leaves
Competitive salary (+13-month salary include)  
Health insurance, social insurance according to the government regulations 
PVI Healthcare Insurance

Play a key role in shaping the future of our development process and company culture."]

["This role is part of the D&T department of HEINEKEN International. D&T is proud to bring cutting-edge innovation, strong technology, and advanced analytics to HEINEKEN. With speed and agility, we ensure HEINEKEN has the technological competitive advantages it needs to deliver on its ambition. 
The role in as part of the APAC Data & Analytics Hub is critical in Heineken to operationalise our strategy of standardised and scalable data foundations across the region and enterprise. The role holder will work with colleagues across Heineken as part of a team that drive the Research & Development activities of the Advanced Analytics organization by identifying and developing new Analytics opportunities for the enterprise within a specific Function. 
It is essential that the role holder delivers analytical solutions that are both theoretically sound but create immediate business value. This will be achieved by building strong relationships and collaboration with members of the broader HEINEKEN data organisation including Insight Enablement, Data Management and Global Analytics and various programs across the central, regional and Operating Company (OpCo) structures. 
In particular, he/she will partner with a growing group of data professionals such as Data Engineers, Machine Learning Engineers and Product Managers who play a crucial role in the development and delivery of Analytics products at scale.

Responsible for R&D within the Advanced Analytics organization for across multiple products.
Apply software engineering best practices (CI/CD and unit testing) to ensure the reliability and robustness of data science solutions.
Develop predictive models and only standardised value-measurement techniques (e.g. running A/B testing) to solve complex business problems, such as forecasting timeseries, churn prediction.
Participate in scrums and deliver all objectives within a defined scope including defining scope/priority where necessary.
Deliver AA prototype products (pilots) in identified high value areas, and scale to deliver value.
Develop AA prototype products (pilots) to identify next high value product for HEINEKEN.
Maintain strong relationships with stakeholders to ensure collaboration and delivery of objectives.
Continued self-development and research of best-in-class analytical approached.
K·ªπ nƒÉng & Chuy√™n m√¥n
Qualifications:
BA/MSc in Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field; equivalent work experience accepted.
3+ years in a pure analytical/science role.
Experience / Skills (all levels): 
Past record of successful Data Science projects.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Breadth and Depth in Data Science and Machine Learning.
Ability to build and maintain strong collaborative relationships with stakeholders across the business.
Demonstrated ability to effectively manage multiple simultaneous projects and deliverables.
Communicate effectively with various stakeholders, tailoring your message to your audience's level of technical understanding.
Knowledge of industry trends and demonstrated commitment to stay up to date on new technologies.
Knowledge of Machine Learning, Statistics, and related fields.
Fluent Python and thorough knowledge of pandas & scikit-learn.

Experience with Azure development environment
Experience working with a large development team (CI/CD)
Ph√∫c l·ª£i d√†nh cho b·∫°n

mo_ta_cong_viec:
["The DWPS Senior Operations Specialist will be a part of the global service desk technicians' team in the Digital Workplace Services organization. The team is primarily an L1-L2 support team providing incident and request management to a global business.
In this role, your job will split:
50% of time will be expected to manage the day-to-day tickets efficiently and effectively, especially tickets escalations.
Another 50% of your time, you will participate in major changes and technically oversee L1 activities, by ensuring all activities are covered by Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), including working on procedures improvements.
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
Provide L2 end user support, analyzing and fixing issues where appropriate, acting as escalation engineer.
Be accountable for technical aspects in Global Service Desk.
Work together with Engineering Teams and ensure smooth handover to L1.
Implement process or service changes where required to improve service performance.
Remote issues troubleshooting.
K·ªπ nƒÉng & Chuy√™n m√¥n
At least 5 years of experience in working as IT Administrator
Accuracy and attention to detail, with good prioritizing skills
Experience with M365 solutions (Azure AD, Intune, Office suite) and Windows 10/11 administration
Ability to work unsupervised using own initiative
Excellent communication skills, with a customer-oriented approach, languages: good at English communication.
Nice to have
Microsoft Endpoint Management certification
ITIL certification
Ph√∫c l·ª£i d√†nh cho b·∫°n
What are you waiting for? Join our international team today!
SPS is a leading technology-driven business transformation company. With our innovative Enterprise Workplace Solutions, we empower organizations to adopt hybrid work concepts to enhance productivity and flexibility. Our Technology Business Solutions bring together cutting-edge technology, deep vertical process expertise, and a diverse global workforce to support clients in their digital transformation journey and efficiently tackle their most complex challenges. Headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland, SPS operates in more than 20 countries and focuses on clients in banking, insurance and health. SPS has more than 8,500 employees and is recognized with a world-class NPS by its global client base. We act with precision, connect people to the right information, and turn data into insights for better outcomes. Discover how our dedicated team at SPS makes an impact that matters by visiting www.spsglobal.com.
1. Great Benefits:
Competitive and performance-oriented remuneration system
On-going training and development plan
Promotion & bonus opportunities
Private medical care for you and your family,
Professional and challenging working environment.2. Advance your career:
We provide you with support to sharpen your skills and knowledge for further steps in your career path
Opportunities to learn and grow through different types of training: Talent Development program, Succession planning as well as promotions or transfers.
3. Break your limits:
The innovation is a key value of SPS Vietnam. Joining our team, you are encouraged to think out of the box, cross your boundaries and improve yourself in our continuous improvement process during daily business operation.
4. Go Global:
The moment you join SPS Vietnam is the moment you take the chance to extend your horizon. You will work, cooperate and exchange your creative ideas with 7,500 employees of SPS. Our customers, which are 20% of Fortune 100, are located from around the world.
Notes:
‚ÄúBy applying for the job at SPS Vietnam, it is considered that Candidates agree to provide personal data for SPS Vietnam to process in accordance with the Terms and Conditions of personal data processing of candidates which are in line with Decree 13/2023/ND-CP on personal data protection."]

mo_ta_cong_viec:
['ONE OF THE TOP ICT JAPANESE COMPANIES IN VIETNAM.
NEC Corp is a leader in the integration of IT and network technologies that benefit businesses and people around the world. NEC has more than 50 countries, 289 branches, and 117,418 employees worldwide. Under the company's corporate message of "Orchestrating a brighter world," NEC aims to help solve a wide range of challenging issues and to create new social value for the changing world of tomorrow.
Established in 2006, up to now, NEC Vietnam has grown with more than 200 employees in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City. We have been working hard to carry out many social contribution activities to bring more laughter and improve the quality of life.
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
NECVN performs the Japanese quality IT development based on ISO9001 certification. As a Senior Manager of the QM (quality management) team, you will be responsible for ensuring and developing the Quality strategies, policies, processes, standards and systems for NEC Vietnam.
Plan examination, supervision, and ensure the project complies with established processes and regulations; ensure quality and minimize risks in software development projects according to ISO9001.
Participate in improving project processes and quality, and also at organizational level.
Manage project process compliance, issue risk/issue warnings, and analyze causes/take preventive and corrective actions with the project.
Design and provide training guidance, tools, methodologies by developing training schedules to train all employees. Maintain QMS training and training evaluation records.
Conduct internal systems audits and process audits. Implement corrective actions for audit non-conformance findings.
Hold periodical audit performance meetings with all cross-functional stakeholders.
Prepare audit reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing audit findings data.
Build, maintain and continuously improve the project quality and progress control system.
Guidance on quality control activities to the Project Manager/Manager.
Japanese, English interpretation and translation.
K·ªπ nƒÉng & Chuy√™n m√¥n
University or higher degree in IT, Computer Mathematics or a relevant major.
Minimum 10 years‚Äô experience majority in quality management including 3 years as a Senior Manager/Manager in software development for the Japanese market.
Experience in defining strategies for controlling & improving quality assurance.
Experience in identifying, analyzing, and managing risks on large, complex projects.
Experience in writing specifications such as design and test specifications is required.
Strong knowledge of ISO 9001, ISO 27001, CMMI and other ISO frameworks.
In-depth knowledge of the PMP and certifications is preferred.
Proficiency in Japanese (JLPT N2+) and English (TOEIC 700+).
Strong leadership and interpersonal skills, motivating members.
Ph√∫c l·ª£i d√†nh cho b·∫°n
Working time: Mon-Fri, Hybrid working mode (WFH available)
13th Salary + Year-End Reward (a half month) + Excellent Bonus (up to 5 months)
Special allowance for foreign language certificate (up to 500USD/month)
Full social package (SI, HI, UI) with the company, and the law of Vietnam
Annual Health check at the top healthcare center
19 days of paid leave
Free Japanese class; 1:1 class with native teachers
Udemy account provided & Sponsor examination fee for technical certificates such as AWS, Azure, PMP, etc and get the incentive (up to 10M)
Many company activities to tighten the relationship between employees: Company trip, Year-end Event, Team building, Sports Day, Family Day, Outing Trip, etc.
Reward Most Valuable Player (MVP) for individual & team twice a year
Sports clubs provided (100% sponsored by the company): Football, Badminton
Professional environment with clear procedures and well-working facilities
Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments in Japan, APAC']

NEC established its liaison office in Vietnam in the early 1990s. In line with its growth strategy, it was re-organized as NEC Vietnam Co., Ltd. in 2006, with a newfound commitment to grow the business and contribute towards the people and society of Vietnam.
In a rapidly changing business environment, we have evolved to be a comprehensive solution provider, to deliver on our core strengths of providing Solutions for Society, which involves providing social infrastructure benefiting citizens and communities.

mo_ta_cong_viec:
["We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Front-End Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will  have extensive experience in building and maintaining large-scale web applications using Angular, TypeScript, and  ReactJS. You will play a key role in refactoring existing Angular projects to improve performance, scalability, and  maintainability. 
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
Develop and Maintain Web Applications: 
Design, develop, and optimize user-facing features using Angular, TypeScript, and ReactJS.
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs. 
Build reusable code and libraries for future use. 
Project Refactoring: 
Lead the refactoring of existing Angular projects to enhance performance and maintainability.
Identify and implement best practices for code quality and architecture. 
Collaborate with backend developers to integrate front-end components with server-side logic.
Technical Leadership: 
Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews to ensure adherence to best practices.
Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies. 
Advocate for and implement front-end development best practices across the team. 
Collaboration: 
Work closely with designers, product managers, and other stakeholders to deliver high-quality products.
Participate in agile ceremonies and contribute to sprint planning, retrospectives, and daily stand-ups. 
K·ªπ nƒÉng & Chuy√™n m√¥n
Technical Skills: 
Expertise in Angular: Proven experience in building and maintaining Angular applications.
Proficiency in TypeScript: Strong knowledge of TypeScript and its features. 
Experience with ReactJS: Hands-on experience with ReactJS, including component-based architecture.
Code Refactoring: Experience in refactoring and improving existing codebases. 
Responsive Design: Knowledge of modern CSS, HTML5, and responsive design principles.
Testing: Familiarity with front-end testing frameworks (e.g., Jasmine, Karma, Jest). 
Tooling: Experience with modern development tools and workflows (e.g., Webpack, Babel, npm, Git). 
Soft Skills:
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail. 
Strong communication and collaboration skills. 
Ability to work independently and in a team environment. 
Ability to manage and prioritize multiple tasks effectively. 
Experience:
Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
Experience: 5+ years of professional front-end development experience, with a strong focus on Angular (min 3 years of experience working with Angular 2+) and TypeScript. 
Project Experience: Proven experience in refactoring and optimizing existing Angular projects. 
Ph√∫c l·ª£i d√†nh cho b·∫°n
Competitive Salary: 
Salary: Up to 3.600 USD depending on experience and qualifications.
Attractive and competitive salary and bonus schemes in the market. 
Performance bonus and year-end bonus based on work achievements. 
Work Environment: 
Fully equipped with necessary working devices to ensure work quality. 
Exposure to the latest technologies. 
Young, creative, and professional working environment. 
Team building activities, trips, and internal events. 
Career Development: 
Clear opportunities for promotion and career development. 
Training programs and professional skill development. 
Entitlements: 
Annual leave as per legal regulations. 
Holidays, Tet holidays, and other leave as per company regulations. 
Full insurance benefits as per regulations. "]

Are you ready to become part of this technology revolution?

V·ªÅ ch√∫ng t√¥i
As a cornerstone of FPT Corporation, a leader in integrated solutions and IT services in Vietnam for nearly three decades, FPT IS proudly stands as a trusted partner, committed to co-creating future value through technology alongside top enterprises and organizations, both domestically and globally.
Recognized for its technical expertise by customers and partners worldwide, FPT IS has been instrumental in designing and implementing comprehensive IT products, projects, services, and solutions across key sectors, enriching the lives of millions. With over 3,400 employees and an extensive network of offices and branches spanning all 63 provinces and cities, FPT IS has recently been honored by Vietnam Report as one of the Top 10 Most Reputable Technology Companies in 2023, and also awarded the "Best Companies To Work For In Asia 2023" accolade by HR Asia.

mo_ta_cong_viec:
['iZOTA focuses on accelerating digital transformation and unique productions and services to our customers . We are developing productions and services which are spreading across telecommunication, financial, media and other day-to-day activities. Therefore, you will not miss the chance being part of great team with interesting and challenging technical problems. 
We are looking for candidates from junior to senior level with interests, experience and willingness to learn around new technologies, such as distributed event-stores and parallel/distributed computing frameworks (Docker, Kubernetes). Engineers who thrive at iZOTA are mindful of open-source community dynamics and equally aware of the needs of delivering great products.
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
The successful candidate will have proven programming experience and is able to work both independently and collaboratively. You will be a crucial part of the team, so you will have the chance to make a real difference and grow your career.
You will be responsible for designing sophisticated software systems and services, integrating software with other distributed systems and APIs, and working with a great team of software engineers. You will be encouraged to stay curious and pick the best technology for a given problem. You will also partner with cross functional teams across product management and UI/UX design.
Essential
Professional experience of coding (including best practices and common conventions).
Evidence of delivering consumer-facing, mass-market, networked, high-performance mobile applications
Experience of automation.
Xcode and Android Studio - our main tools of the trade
Experience integrating APIs (our primary API is currently GraphQL) and integrating third-party services
Understanding of analytics, remote reporting, measurements, experiments and AB test systems
Sound computer science foundations: algorithms, data structures, concurrency, threading, and programming languages.
Ability to debug and optimize complex code.
K·ªπ nƒÉng & Chuy√™n m√¥n
Technical Skills Required:
Proven experience with more than 3+ experiences
Knowledge of technologies such as Firebase
Solid understanding of the full mobile development lifecycle
Experience with state management solutions like Provider, Riverpod, or Bloc. Especially GetX
Experience developing mobile apps natively in iOS and/or Android
Experience developing plugin and/or package of Flutter is a plus
Experience in improving performance of UI
Build and UI with proficiency in custom widgets
Nice to have:
Defect tracking software (Jira preferred) would be advantageous.
Knowledge of distributed version control systems.
Experience with automated build and continuous integration suites.
DevOps Experience.
Education:
Graduated with a IT/Computer Science/Telecommunication related degree.
Knowledge:
Solid development experience of working in a commercial environment 
Experience working with agile methodologies. 
Experience:
3+ years of experience building, shipping, and maintaining mobile applications.
Skills:
Communication and presentation
Problem solving
Teamwork
Time management
Ph√∫c l·ª£i d√†nh cho b·∫°n
Working hours:
Monday-Friday: 8:30 am ‚Äì 5:30 pm
Saturday: 8:30 am ‚Äì 12:00 pm
Working address:
20/33a Dong Xoai, Ward 13, Tan Binh District, Ho Chi Minh City
Benefits:
Company provides lunch
Participate in insurance after probation
Work in a young team environment, with dedicated and visionary management
Holiday and New Year bonuses depending on revenue
Annual leave']

mo_ta_cong_viec:
["We are seeking a highly skilled and innovative software engineer to lead the development of multiple AI-powered solutions that will address key business and operational challenges within our company. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in chatbot and voice bot development, with the primary goal of automating our Customer Service and Collections processes, while also enhancing the efficiency of our call center operations.
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
Design, Develop, and Deploy AI Bots: Lead the creation and implementation of chatbot and voice bot systems tailored to our business needs.
Enhance AI Features: Continuously improve the capabilities of the bots, including voice recognition, image processing, and speech-to-speech functionality, to ensure more intuitive interactions and better user experiences.
Integration with Telephony Systems: Seamlessly integrate the AI bots with our existing telephony infrastructure, ensuring smooth operation across all communication channels.
Performance Optimization: Conduct rigorous testing and debugging to ensure the bots deliver optimal performance in real-time, high-pressure environments.
AI-Driven Automation: Leverage AI to automate customer service inquiries, streamline collections processes, and optimize call center workflows for improved operational efficiency.
K·ªπ nƒÉng & Chuy√™n m√¥n
Proficiency in Chatbot/ Voice Bot Development: Extensive experience in building, deploying, and maintaining both text-based chatbots and voice-based bots for real-world applications.
Voice Recognition & Speech Technologies: Strong understanding of voice recognition systems, speech-to-text, and text-to-speech technologies.
Image Processing: Familiarity with image processing techniques to enhance bot capabilities where visual data is involved.
Telephony Services Integration: Hands-on experience integrating AI solutions with telephony platforms (e.g., VoIP systems, WebRTC, SIP).
Python Expertise: Deep knowledge of Python for building scalable AI models and system integrations.
Nice to have:
Natural Language Processing (NLP): Knowledge of NLP techniques to improve the bots' understanding of human language and conversational nuances.
Cloud & DevOps Experience: Familiarity with deploying AI systems on cloud platforms and automating CI/CD pipelines.
Ph√∫c l·ª£i d√†nh cho b·∫°n
Flexible working hour
Well-equipped facility
Year- end bonus"]

BillEase offers you the easiest way to afford what you want and need today. Our brand centers around making shopping and payment processes seamless and convenient. Our customers have diverse lifestyles and are looking to enhance their shopping experiences both online and offline.
It's essential for us to embody the core of our brand name ‚Äî BillEase, a combination of "bill" and "ease," pronounced ‚Äòbilis,‚Äô which means speed or swiftness in Filipino.

mo_ta_cong_viec:
['About Us
MiTek is a platform innovator and enabler that exists to transform the building industry with better building solutions. In 1955, MiTek transformed residential construction with the invention of the Gang-Nail plate and a digital platform that provided an affordable and scalable way to manufacture wood trusses. Today, MiTek delivers software, services, engineered products, and automated solutions that enable the building industry to improve efficiencies by optimizing the balance between off-site and on-site. With nearly 5,600 team members worldwide, MiTek collaborates across the building industry to enable and accelerate transformational breakthroughs in design and construction to transform the way the industry designs, makes, and builds. As a Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK-A, NYSE: BRK-B) company since 2001, MiTek has a record of continuous growth and innovation. Learn more at www.mii.com.
Overview
As a software engineer in our Homebuilder division you will be responsible for supporting and enhancing a web based ERP system (Kova) used widely by construction companies in both the US and Canada. Kova‚Äôs workflow based approach allows organizations to implement key business processes from customer management, purchase orders, to accounting on a single unified platform. Coupled with other Homebuilder technology, Kova enables a focused customer engagement effort, using innovation to facilitate key workflows, solve core business challenges, and streamline company operations.
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
Provide technical leadership for all phases of the software development life cycle
Lead, mentor, and coach junior developers
Collaborate with teams responsible for requirements, development, and quality assurance to ensure solutions are efficient, consistent, and fulfill business needs
Code, test, document, configure, and debug web solutions

['Join The Game! 
Leader in the development and publishing of games, Gameloft¬Æ has established itself as a pioneer in the industry, creating innovative gaming experiences for over 20 years. Gameloft creates games for all digital platforms, from mobile to cross-platform titles for PC and consoles. Gameloft operates its own established franchises such as Asphalt¬Æ, Dragon Mania Legends, Modern Combat and Dungeon Hunter and also partners with major rights holders including LEGO¬Æ, Universal, Illumination Entertainment, Hasbro¬Æ, Fox Digital Entertainment, Mattel¬Æ, Lamborghini¬Æ, and Ferrari¬Æ. Gameloft distributes its games in over 100 countries and employs 3,400 people worldwide. Every month, 55 million unique users can be reached by advertisers in Gameloft games with Gameloft for brands, a leading B2B offering dedicated to brands and agencies. Gameloft is a Vivendi company.  
All trademarks referenced above are owned by their respective trademark owners.
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
Define the business tracking need for specific KPI, working efficiently with the Data Tracking Specialist to provide accurate data analysis
Acquire data from different data sources and maintain databases/data systems, filter and ‚Äúclean‚Äù data by discovering any mismatches or outliers
Analyze data using statistical techniques and provide ongoing reports, propose enhancement/KPI
Analyze player behavior, evaluate game performance, interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets and propose suggestions to business challenge
Collaborate with live-ops and creation game teams to understand the insight and prioritize the analysis needs, point out bottlenecks in productions and propose solutions
Present information using dashboards and other data visualization techniques
Provide monthly main KPIs data evolution, quarterly player and data analysis and list of recommendations for game projects
K·ªπ nƒÉng & Chuy√™n m√¥n
At least 2 years working experience as a Data Analyst on gaming or mobile application industries
Business Intelligence in Kids Gaming are a big plus
Knowledge on Business Intelligence tools as Metabase, Microsoft Power BI or Looker are a must
Knowledge of and experience with reporting packages (Business Objects etc.), databases (SQL etc.), programming (XML, JavaScript, or ETL frameworks)
Knowledge of statistics and experience using statistical packages for analyzing datasets (Excel, SPSS, SAS etc.)
Knowledge of Jira (Data, Dashboards, JQL queries) is a plus
Adept at queries, report writing and presenting findings
Technical expertise regarding data models, database design development, data mining and segmentation techniques
Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy
High presentation, reporting and communication skills with professional English competency
Strong team spirit, high commitment and self-discipline
Meticulousness, result-oriented working approach, flexible attitude and a quick learner
Additional Information
Recruitment Process:
(1) Screening call;
(2) Test,
(2) Interview;
(3) Offer.
Work Location and Hours:
Work location: 26 Ung Van Khiem, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City.
Work hours: 08:30 AM - 06:00 PM, Monday - Friday.
Ph√∫c l·ª£i d√†nh cho b·∫°n
Why Join Gameloft?
You want to work in an exceptional industry and create games downloaded more than 1 billion times per year.
You want to be part of a talented and supportive team of pioneers who have a passion for creating video games.
You want to contribute to a vibrant and dynamic atmosphere.
You want to join a global company and meet great people around the world.
You will work on an employment contract with competitive remuneration and benefits package.
You are looking for a fun place to work in the heart of the city.
What We Offer:
A hybrid working model.
A dynamic workplace environment, with over 18 nationalities, where hundreds of world-renowned game titles were born.
A range of well-being events and policies to support employees physically, mentally, and emotionally.
An open-space office, a cafeteria, a terrace and a Gaming Area.
Various training packages, including internal training, sponsorship training, and e-learning (iLearn, Udemy,...).
Opportunities to collaborate and train with Gameloft worldwide experts and develop yourselves.
An attractive monthly salary alongside Tet and other performance bonuses.
Minimum 12 days of paid annual leave, plus 5 days of paid sick leave, Christmas leave, Birthday leave, Giving-back leave,...
100% coverage of mandatory insurance and extra healthcare insurance.
A monthly allowance to support lunch meals and working-from-home electricity and Internet bills.
Other benefits from one of the best employers in Vietnam.']

mo_ta_cong_viec:
["We are seeking an experienced and results-driven Mid-level/Senior Project Coordinator with at least 3-5 years of experience to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for overseeing the successful implementation of projects, ensuring they are delivered within scope, timeline, and budget. 
The ideal candidate will have a strong background in project management, excellent communication skills, and a proven ability to work with cross-functional teams. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to the growth and success of our product, SimpleMDG, by driving the successful execution of implementation projects.
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
Project Planning: Collaborate with stakeholders to define project objectives, scope, and deliverables. Develop detailed project plans, including timelines, resource requirements, and risk mitigation strategies.
Project Execution: Lead cross-functional project teams in executing project plans. Monitor project progress, identify and resolve issues, and ensure adherence to project milestones and deadlines.
Stakeholder Management: Establish and maintain effective relationships with internal and external stakeholders. Communicate project updates, risks, and issues in a clear and timely manner. Address stakeholder concerns and manage expectations throughout the project lifecycle.
Resource Management: Allocate and manage project resources efficiently, ensuring optimal utilization. Collaborate with team members and functional managers to secure necessary resources for project activities.
Risk Management: Identify project risks and develop risk mitigation strategies. Proactively monitor and manage risks throughout the project lifecycle, implementing contingency plans as needed.
Quality Assurance: Develop and implement quality assurance processes to ensure project deliverables meet established standards. Conduct regular project reviews and audits to identify areas for improvement and ensure project success.
Reporting and Documentation: Prepare and present project status reports to stakeholders, providing updates on project progress, milestones, risks, and issues. Maintain accurate and up-to-date project documentation, including project plans, schedules, and change requests.
Continuous Improvement: Identify process improvement opportunities and implement best practices to enhance project management methodologies and drive efficiency.
K·ªπ nƒÉng & Chuy√™n m√¥n
Strong fluency in English is a must, Japanese is a plus
The ability to work in the evening or early morning base on the project
Education: Bachelor's Degree in business administration, information technology, or equivalent experience
Experience: Minimum of 3 years of experience in project management, with a focus on implementing projects. Demonstrated experience managing projects through the entire project lifecycle. In absence of years of experience, certifications or past work may be used to show the level of experience needed to perform at this level.
Project Management Skills: Strong project management skills with a proven ability to deliver projects on time, within budget, and according to scope. Proficient in project management methodologies, tools, and techniques.
Leadership and Communication: Excellent leadership abilities with the capacity to motivate and inspire project teams. Exceptional communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to effectively communicate with stakeholders at all levels.
Quality Assurance: Develop and implement quality assurance processes to ensure project deliverables meet established standards. Conduct regular project reviews and audits to identify areas for improvement and ensure project success.
Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify issues, develop solutions, and make informed decisions.
Professionalism: Maintain a high level of professionalism in all interactions, both internally and externally. This includes exhibiting punctuality, meeting deadlines, and dressing appropriately.
Agile Learning: Demonstrate a willingness to learn new skills and adapt to changing project requirements. Be comfortable working in a fast-paced environment and embrace continuous improvement.
Technical Knowledge: Familiarity with project management software, collaboration tools, Microsoft Office Suite and Atlassian tools.
Industry Knowledge: Basic knowledge of the industry or domain relevant to the organization's projects is preferred.
Ph√∫c l·ª£i d√†nh cho b·∫°n
15 days of annual leaves
Competitive salary (+13-month salary include)  
Health insurance, social insurance according to the government regulations 
PVI Healthcare Insurance 
Have a chance to work in an international, friendly, open environment  
Annual Travel opportunity"]

mo_ta_cong_viec:
["We're growing our team again and are looking for more devs to join us launching our new app to the world. We're looking for talented devs interested in working with a product company.
About Us
In 2004, MenuWise (called MyRecipes back then) rocked the food service industry with an app which enabled users to do things they previously could only dream of. We gave New Zealand's professional chefs the power to cost any recipe in just minutes, as well as know the nutriton - something which was prone to error, was difficult, and used to take a long time.
While we made headlines, and were in fact SAAS pioneers, we didn't think much of this. For us, it was just the beginning of a mission which had only just begun.
Fast forward 20 years, (gee! where did that go?!) with the support of our users who love our app, we're on a new mission to take this to the world using cutting edge tech to do things even smarter, easier and faster.
You can see (and use) our legacy app at htps://menucoster.co.nz
Who we are
Our current team of 13 are based in Vietnam and the Philippines and are all incredibly passionate about what we do. We're very excited about what we are building and cant wait to release our new version. We follow agile methodology and love working together as a team.
Our team values and team culture revolve around:
Simplification over complication. Removing and decrypting jargon.
Efficiency and smart thinking over hard work.
Work-life balance. We all value local working hours and respect time away from work.
We celebrate the wins. And often.
Teamwork. Collaboration fuels our success. We all win together.
Innovation. We seek new ways to solve problems.
Delight. Usability is good, but delight is better. We aim to surprise and exceed expectations.
Communication. Above all else, clear communication keeps us aligned.
Who we are seeking
We are seeking a skilled Nest.js Developer proficient in TypeScript to join our dynamic team. You will play a crucial role in designing, implementing, and maintaining our server-side application using Nest.js.
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
Server-Side Logic: Develop all server-side logic, ensuring efficient data exchange between the server and users. 
Database Management: Define and maintain the central database, optimizing performance and responsiveness. 
Integration: Connect the application with other web services (open third-party) and seamlessly integrate front-end elements. 
Performance Optimizaton: Focus on performance enhancements, security measures, and code quality maintenance. 
API Development: Create robust APIs to support application functionality. 
Testing and Debugging: Conduct meticulous testing and debugging to uphold application integrity.
K·ªπ nƒÉng & Chuy√™n m√¥n
Experience 
Proficiency in TypeScript.
Database Knowledge: Excellent understanding of SQL particularly PostgreSQL. 
RESTful APIs: Familiarity with RESTful API design and implementaon. 
Version Control: Experience with code versioning tools (e.g., Git). 
Front-end Familiarity: Basic knowledge of front-end technologies. 
Server Deployment: Understanding of server deployment processes. 
Experience with unit tests. 
Basic understanding of Dev-Ops, particularly AWS
Search engine: eg Elastic search/ Typesense
English: we communicate in English and expect reasonable proficency to participate in standup etc. Great opportunity to improve your English.
Qualifications 
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
Ph√∫c l·ª£i d√†nh cho b·∫°n
Awesome team, no overtime, exciting product."]

["As a Senior Java Backend Developer at OPES Insurance, you will play a crucial role in building and developing core systems and insurance business software to support the company's operations. Your responsibilities will include ensuring seamless integration and stable operation of systems between OPES and its business partners.
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
1. Design & Develop Software Systems:
Collaborate with team members to design and break down application modules and functions based on business requirements.
Build databases that meet business needs.
Develop and maintain backend applications for web platforms.
Integrate with middleware APIs to ensure end-to-end interaction flow.
2. Support Application Transfer:
Train and transfer knowledge about the developed/deployed software systems to relevant units.
3. Handle System Errors and Issues:
Receive, fix, and timely upgrade applications when errors arise or when there is a need to upgrade product features.
K·ªπ nƒÉng & Chuy√™n m√¥n
1. Educational Background:
Bachelor's degree in Information Technology (IT) or related fields.
2. Relevant Knowledge/Expertise:
Proficient in Java Spring & Hibernate.
Strong understanding of relational databases and proficiency in SQL.
Additional knowledge/expertise is an advantage (preferred):
JavaScript, Node.js/React.js framework.
Understanding and experience with client-server model and microservices architecture.
Knowledge and experience with Big Data, Elasticsearch, and Kibana are a plus.
3. Skills:
Strong analytical, design, programming, and deployment skills for applications and software services.
Proactive in learning and implementing new technologies.
Open to changes or completely redoing projects when required.
Teamwork skills and ability to read and understand English technical documents.
4. Relevant Experience:
At least 3 years of experience in software system development.
Preferably experienced in the insurance sector or involved in programming system projects in the insurance field.
Experience in project-based work, especially with Big Data, Data Analytics, OCR, AI projects is a plus.
Ph√∫c l·ª£i d√†nh cho b·∫°n
Full salary during the probation period.
13th-month salary + performance bonus + holiday bonuses.
Comprehensive welfare package: Social insurance, OPES Care health insurance for employees and their families, lunch, transportation, and phone allowances.
Preferential loan support for OPESers from VPBank (home loans/consumer loans).
Personal development guidance and support through annual IDP programs.
Balanced work schedule focused on efficiency: 5 working days/week (off on Saturdays and Sundays). Annual leave from 14 to 21 days (based on seniority).
A youthful, dynamic working environment with corporate cultural activities, team building, and travel events."]

['FPT Automotive is part of FPT Corporation, specializing in providing software services and solutions for automobiles. It is a leading partner for dozens of the world‚Äôs largest car manufacturers from Japan, South Korea, the United States, Canada, and more. FA boasts a team of experts with decades of experience in C/C++ programming and the development of embedded systems for automobiles.
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
Embedded Development: 
Design, develop, and optimize embedded software for automotive applications.
Implement software components based on AUTOSAR architecture and ensure integration with ECUs.
Collaborate with hardware engineers to ensure seamless integration between software and hardware components.
Debug and troubleshoot software to resolve development and operational issues.
Participate in code reviews and adhere to industry standards, including MISRA and AUTOSAR guidelines.
Testing and Validation:
Create, execute, and maintain unit and integration tests for software components and ECUs.
Analyze test reports, provide feedback, and report bugs to the software and system teams.
Execute Polyspace to identify and fix issues related to MISRA coding conventions.
Use CANoe and CAPL scripts to simulate CAN messages for testing purposes.
Manage and automate test scripts to support continuous integration and deployment.
Configuration and Simulation:
Configure AUTOSAR Basic Software (BSW) and manage integration into the system architecture.
Simulate real-world scenarios to validate the performance and reliability of embedded systems.
K·ªπ nƒÉng & Chuy√™n m√¥n
Experience:
At least 1 year of experience in Automation Testing and Embedded Development for Automotive software.
Proven experience in developing and testing embedded software components for ECUs.
Technical Skills:
Strong coding skills in C/C++ for embedded systems.
Proficient in AUTOSAR architecture, BSW configuration, and integration.
Experience with Polyspace for code analysis and compliance with MISRA coding standards.
Proficient in CANoe and CAPL scripting for CAN message simulation.
Familiarity with managing and automating test scripts for continuous integration.
Language Skills:
Good at English.
Preferred Skills:
Knowledge of additional automotive testing tools and frameworks.
Familiarity with automotive safety standards (ISO 26262, ASPICE).
Experience in debugging embedded software and hardware integration issues.
Nice to have:
Experience in the automotive industry or with embedded systems.
Knowledge of Lean practices and other Agile frameworks (e.g., Kanban, SAFe).
Experience working in a global or multicultural environment.
Ph√∫c l·ª£i d√†nh cho b·∫°n
Be part of our hugely international environment; we are currently working for Japanese projects, where you can have many opportunities to working overseas.
Competitive salary package based on skills and experience
Awesome social events and parties for employees
We create great teams and take very good care of them
Great opportunity to grow with the company
Frequent staff activities and company parties
Awesome social events and parties for employees
20% discount on school fee if your sons/ daughters join FPT School
Udemy/ ELSA PRO accounts for every employee & Udacity accounts for Managers.
Special offer for senior level:
Relocating package: Up to 100M (for senior candidates from Hanoi/HCM.C to Da Nang City).
Loan support: 4% interest rate (1 ‚Äì 2 Billion VND package).']

["The Systems Compliance Administrator I is responsible for managing, monitoring, and maintaining Windows patch levels on servers and workstations, diagnosing and troubleshooting Windows patching and SCCM/Intune client errors, and ensuring compliance levels based on Tenable reports provided by Sec OPS. This role works closely with the global compliance team, focusing on identifying compliance breaches and applications requiring updates in the Vietnam environment. It's crucial for maintaining the integrity and security of the IT environment while also supporting business operations.  The role requires flexibility to support pre-scheduled after-hours or weekend work and support.
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác

['We are looking for full-time or part-time research software developers including Junior/Senior/Lead Algorithm Engineers, Software Engineers, and Frontend Engineers. You will join our product development or research project. You will be mentored by and work with Professor Kevin Chang at CS @ University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign (UIUC), senior engineers at Cazoodle Inc. Hanoi, and senior graduate students at UIUC. You can work remotely online or physically in our office in Hanoi. You are expected to commit flexibly from 20 hours/week (part-time) to 40 hours/week (full-time position).
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
Project Description: AI-based knowledge discovery and acquisition by exploring, searching, and synthesizing knowledge from large scale structured and unstructured data across millions of websites on the Internet. Specifically, we build vertical search engines that help users explore and find information in a vertical domain and community information services that connect people with the knowledge they need in a professional community. 
Techniques: You will learn about and apply artificial intelligence, natural language processing, database, and data mining techniques. You will implement novel algorithms and build end-to-end software systems.
K·ªπ nƒÉng & Chuy√™n m√¥n
You are an ideal candidate if you can:
Effectively communicate in English.
Develop backend or frontend or full-stack software.
Read research papers and understand how to reproduce.
Build/implement AI/NLP/DB/DM techniques such as word embedding, information extraction, large language model, database querying, and web search.
Welcome fresher candidates or new graduates.
* Pay: $850 - 3500/month (full-time) or $5 - 20/hour (part-time), depending on qualification.
* Note: 
Submit your application at This form (required)
Apply with English CV
Ph√∫c l·ª£i d√†nh cho b·∫°n
Pay: $850 - 3500/month (full-time) or $5 - 20/hour (part-time), depending on qualification.']

Cazoodle specializes in building new search engines that aggregate information from thousands of online sources, creating a one stop-destination for users to quickly navigate through all their possible choices for finding funding opportunities, renting an apartment or buying a certain product. We are seeking software developers to join our team tasked with maintaining and developing not only our vertical search applications but also our crawling platform which helps collect and aggregate data from online sources.

["Ch√≠ Doanh - CB/I Digital is a leading cloud software and digital marketing company with offices in New York, US and Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. We provide cloud software platforms and performance marketing for large enterprise clients and growing brands, including First Citizens Bank, Beam Suntory, LVMH in the U.S. or Be Group, Vinfast, Hoan My Medical Group, and  ACB Bank in Vietnam. 
CB/I made Inc. 5000 list for fastest growing private companies in America in 2022, and won two Stevie American Business Awards for Best Marketing Campaigns for Paid Advertising and SEO in 2023.
We built Conative.ai, the data & predictive analytics SaaS platform for Retail & Ecommerce. Conative.ai helps retail brands increase marketing and inventory efficiencies with our data engine, AI engine and an analytic engine that deliver near-real time data analytics and actionable insights.
We have an ambitious culture that aims to achieve very ambitious goals for our client‚Äôs success, demands the very best of ourselves, and honors deep integrity and dedication. We are an Adobe Solutions Partner, Google Premier Partner, and Facebook Business Partner.
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
We are seeking an experienced skilled AI Researcher to join our dynamic team and contribute to cutting-edge projects within the realm of D2C e-commerce, retail. As an AI Researcher, be involved in research and building advanced AI solutions for CB/I's products.
Work with a business owner and Product team to drive the development of AI model
Sale Demand Forecasting: Utilizing Transformer, CLIP, and LLM models to accurately predict sales demand and product trends for retailers.
Marketing Optimization: Crafting deep reinforcement learning algorithms to enhance the efficiency of marketing campaigns.
Generative AI: Developing and implementing state-of-the-art generative AI models and algorithms.
Performance and Scalability: Improving the overall performance and scalability of existing AI models and algorithms.
K·ªπ nƒÉng & Chuy√™n m√¥n
Bachelor‚Äôs degree or higher in Computer Science, Mathematics, or a related field.
Minimum of 2 years of experience in AI research, especially in time series forecasting, demand forecasting.
Proven experience in developing and deploying AI solutions for existing market products, demonstrating a strong track record of practical application over theoretical research in the ecommerce and retail sectors.
Proficiency in Python, PyTorch, and other AI frameworks and libraries.
Familiarity with cutting-edge AI models such as Transformer, CLIP, LLM, and other relevant techniques.
Strong understanding of deep reinforcement learning and other AI-related algorithms.
Practical experience with Generative AI tools/frameworks, including OpenAI‚Äôs GPT-4 and Langchain.
Strong analytical skills and proven experience working with complex & large data.
Excellent communication, collaboration, and problem-solving skills.
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a team environment.
Passion for continuous learning, keeping abreast of emerging technologies and staying current with the latest trends in AI.
Ph√∫c l·ª£i d√†nh cho b·∫°n
Competitive salary based on candidate's ability & expertise level.
Learn advanced coding techniques from leading industry experts
Gain extensive coding experience and skills from a variety of projects, platforms
Work in a dynamic, transparent, and professional environment
Improve English language and communication skills
Receive social insurance, health insurance, and other benefits following the labor law and company provisions
PLUS Bao Viet, PTI premium insurance
Participate in the company trip every year
Have opportunities for a salary increase ahead of time with a great solid contribution.
Receive the 13th-month salary bonus with good performance and bonus according to the project progress.
Receive overtime pay according to company policy (x1.5 with weekdays, x2 weekends)"]

CBI Digital is a technology and digital marketing company with offices in New York, US, and Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. We develop large-scale, cloud-based platforms and mobile apps for VC-backend technology startups and enterprise clients.
Our client projects include building a telehealth & patient engagement cloud platform using microservice architecture for a large hospital group in Vietnam with over 4 million patients, a data analytics SaaS platform for retail inventory and marketing optimization using CBI's proprietary cloud back-end and front-end solutions, and a marketplace for the sustainable community with over 600 brands.

["We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Data Engineer with a strong background in Databricks, Data Lake, ElasticSearch and Database to join our team. As a Senior Data Engineer, you will play a crucial role in designing, building, and maintaining scalable data solutions to support our organization's data-driven decision-making processes. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to develop efficient data pipelines and ensure the reliability and quality of our data infrastructure
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
Design, develop, and maintain data pipelines using Databricks, Delta Lake, and other relevant technologies to support data analytics and machine learning initiatives.
Manage and optimize data storage solutions, including Data Lake, to ensure high performance and scalability.
Work with NoSQL, SQL databases such as PostgreSQL, MongoDB to handle diverse data sets and unstructured data or structured data. 
Implement ETL/ELT processes and data modeling solutions to transform raw data into valuable insights.
Write complex SQL queries to manage, analyze, and manipulate data across various relational databases.
Collaborate with data scientists, analysts, and other stakeholders to gather requirements and ensure data solutions align with business needs.
Utilize programming languages like Python for data processing and automation of workflows.
Monitor and troubleshoot data pipelines to ensure data quality, consistency, and availability.
Leverage data pipeline orchestration tools such as Apache Airflow or Prefect to automate and schedule data workflows.
Continuously improve data engineering practices by adopting new tools, techniques, and best practices in the industry.
K·ªπ nƒÉng & Chuy√™n m√¥n
Requirements:
4+ years of experience in data engineering or a related role.
Hands-on experience with Databricks and Delta Lake.
Proficient in SQL for querying and managing relational databases.
Experience with NoSQL databases like MongoDB or Cassandra.
Strong programming skills in Python for data processing.
Familiarity with cloud platforms, linux.
Experience with data pipeline orchestration tools such as Apache Airflow, Prefect, or similar.
In-depth understanding of data warehousing concepts, ETL/ELT processes, and data modeling.
Strong problem-solving skills with great attention to detail.
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with big data technologies like Apache Spark, Hadoop, ElasticSearch or Kafka.
Familiarity with CI/CD practices and tools for data engineering
Ph√∫c l·ª£i d√†nh cho b·∫°n
Highly competitive salary (negotiable)
13th month salary
Opportunities for professional growth and development in a fast-growing startup
Exciting projects and cutting-edge technologies
Opportunity to make a significant impact in a startup ready to invest in top talent"]

mo_ta_cong_viec:
["Head of Development is responsible for orienting, building and executing the strategy of developing information technology application solutions to meet the requirements of business and development strategy of the Bank. You will be in charge of critical platforms, solutions and engineering teams within the bank from an IT and engineering point of view. 
As a Head of Development, you are expected to drive engineering excellence, modern engineering practices and help create high performing teams to deliver high quality solutions for customers. 
We are seeking a visionary leader with proven track record of driving excellence in software development.
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
Management and Task coordination:
Build application development plan and orientation. Supervise, assign, review to ensure the quality of application operation execution in order to achieve set goals in development strategy of IT application solutions which serve the whole bank operation.
Orient, analyze, and assess whole-bank new technology application trend in order to update appropriate roadmap and standard
Coordinate with functional units to define the requirements and business development strategy which are the foundation of building development strategy of IT application solutions which serve the whole bank operation
Orient, follow, and support implementation process of investment projects, technology solutions development for the whole bank
Oversea the planning, execution and delivery of developments projects, ensuring alignment with Bank goals and objective.
Establish and maintain project timelines, resource plans and budgets.
Risk management and compliance:
Adhere to Bank policies and procedures, ensuring compliance with management guideline and Bank‚Äôs policy.  
Recognize risk and self-assess risk of the department in operation, make plan to deal with risk and cooperate with relevant units to build methods of measurement, assessment and risk mitigation
Ensure department's activities comply with policies, regulations, processes, internal guideline...and commit to service quality (SLAs)
People Management:
Oversee human resources planning and execution (headcount & costs) of their function/ sub- function.
Attract, onboard and retain the right talents for a high-performing team.
Establish and communicate sub-function/ function and individual KRAs/ KPIs, goals, action plan, expectations and results to reporting line
Manage sub-function/ function performance & provide feedback regularly (following the annual performance management cycle)
Define team‚Äôs capability requirements and enable team member‚Äôs professional and personal development through capability assessment, training, coaching & feedback, mentoring, etc.
Motivate and recognize team members‚Äô contributions towards the team‚Äôs shared goals
Responsible for developing talents within the function/ sub-function
Act as a role model and promote corporate culture at function/ sub-function level
Understand & communicate relevant HR offerings to team members.
Other tasks:
Establish application solution standards to orient and monitor sustainable, flexible, efficient technology solutions.
Participate in building policies, regulations, processes, guideline on application solution development.
Perform other duties assigned by IT Controller.
Lead subordinates to participate in building Bank's corporate culture.
K·ªπ nƒÉng & Chuy√™n m√¥n
University degree or higher, majoring in finance/ economics/ banking/ business administration/ computer science.
Work Experience: 
At least 12 years of experience in Software Engineering, with 7+ years leading SWE teams building customer-facing software applications
At least 7 years of experience in Leadership or management. Experience in managing a team of more than 50 people
Strong technical background with expertise in C#, VB6, ASP.net MVC, Razor Pages, Blazor Pages, Windows Form, Devexperess is a plus.
Experience in Banking Industry and Bank product is also a plus.
You will need to come from a technical background ideally with experience implementing large scale cloud or distributed systems using microservices, web and mobile applications. You should be comfortable being involved in architecture and solution design discussions as well as working with developers and dealing with senior business stakeholders.
You must be pragmatic and able to deal with ambiguity and competing priorities in a fast-paced environment.
Automation and speed to market are also critical and you should drive initiatives within engineering and testing practices to help achieve this.
Foreign language: English: fluent communication
Other requirements: Have a solid knowledge of application systems serving the operation of the whole bank
Ph√∫c l·ª£i d√†nh cho b·∫°n
Outstanding career development opportunities
High performance & dynamic working environment
Great employment benefits
Negotiate
Insurance Coverage
Allowance & additional salary payment
Salary Review Annually
18 days full paid leave per year
Training & Development
Annually Health Checkup"]

Established in 2017, TDT Asia is proud to be the FIRST and ONLY company in Vietnam to provide Financial Platforms to major corporations in the world. TDT's products are being developed in the world's largest financial markets such as USA, Singapore, UK, Hong Kong, Japan... TDT's goal by 2025, TDT will IPO in Singapore/HongKong/Vietnam.
During your time working at TDT, you will be involved in the full cycle of developing the innovative Finance systems such as the Stock/Future/Options/ETF/Forex/Crypto trading platform that connect to famous and largest exchange in the world such as TSE(Tokyo Stock Exchange), HKEx (Hong Kong Stock Exchange), SGX, NYSE, NASDAQ, TOCOM, ICE, Bloomberg, CME... Joining TDT Asia you can freely conquer new technologies, complex financial operations of the world's major financial systems.

mo_ta_cong_viec:
['ABOUT THE TEAM
Our team is responsible for creating a brand of new digital financial platforms and apps that are highly reliable and scalable using modern engineering practices. You will be joining a project which talented software engineers in our Digital Bank Build team who is responsible for designing, building, and maintaining the new digital banking platform and the customer channels. As part of the team, you will be responsible for implementing software features, involve in technical designs, and writing tests to ensure the high-quality delivery of the product. The teams operate in Scrum and DevOps models.
We‚Äôre looking for top engineers out there! During the interview process, we will test your coding and design skills to assess your experience and depth of knowledge. Don‚Äôt worry our interview process will be fun!
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
As a backend engineer, you will be working within a specific problem where you will design, develop, and deploy backend services with a focus on scalability, high availability, and low latency.
Drive the efficient delivery of change through analysis, definition, and documentation of requirements whilst identifying potential solutions using agile delivery frameworks.
Solve complex technical and business problems and learn new technology and frameworks.
Be part of a team that will take full responsibility for the features you own.
Design, develop, test, deploy, monitor, and improve, you are responsible for the full life-cycle of your product ‚Äì build it, own it.
K·ªπ nƒÉng & Chuy√™n m√¥n
You will be a perfect match if your profile ticks some below items:
Must-have:
A pragmatic mindset.
Outstanding problem-solving ability, eagerness to learn, and curiosity.
A few years of software development experience with one or more general-purpose programming languages.
Strong database and schema design for large-scale applications.
Adaptable attitude and personality that is ready for continuous change.
Collaboration and culture fit in the Agile experience will be an advantage.
Good English skills.
Nice to have:
Experience in developing distributed systems on top of micro-services architecture, event-driven architecture using Java, Spring and Spring boot, Kafka, Redis, etc. is a big plus
Experience in AWS, Ansible, Packer, Docker, Rancher, and K8s is a big plus
Experienced in automated testing frameworks is a plus
Good English listening and speaking is a big plus
Experience working in the banking and the financial domain is a plus
Ph√∫c l·ª£i d√†nh cho b·∫°n
13th-month salary bonus provided to all staff members.
Comprehensive healthcare insurance package for you and your dependents.
Annual health check-up included.
12 days of annual leave per year, with the opportunity for 1 additional day per year, up to a maximum of 18 days. Additionally, 3 special Restaff holidays are granted on December 24th, 25th, and 26th.
Hybrid working model allowing for 1 day per week of remote work.
English-speaking working environment.
Overseas business trip opportunities available.
Sponsorship and encouragement for staff members to pursue further education through coverage of tuition fees and examination costs.
Product-oriented approach with an agile project management style, offering a dynamic work environment and the chance to gain expertise in the latest technologies.
Regular gathering parties and team-building activities.

['Corporate Overview
Founded in 2015, WISE COMMERCE is on the path to creating a global digital commerce community for brands and companies in the commerce space. Entrepreneurship is in our DNA and it fuels our innovations helping us develop products and solutions. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive organizational culture. WISE COMMERCE provides Digital Commerce Products and Solutions for organizations of enterprise size to make the merchant‚Äôs life easier. We are headquartered in Seoul, Korea with an office in Hanoi, Vietnam.
Top 3 Reasons to Join Us
Attractive salary and benefits
Professional working environment
Opportunity travelling to Korea for training and business
Tr√°ch nhi·ªám c√¥ng vi·ªác
We are currently seeking experienced Sr. Full Stack Web Developers for a long-term contract. The ideal candidates should possess strong technical knowledge and a proven track record in developing responsive and scalable web applications. The developers will be responsible for writing clean and efficient code, designing user interfaces, and implementing front-end and back-end technologies. They should also have experience with database management and version control systems. The ability to work independently and collaborate effectively in a team environment is essential. Required skills include:
Analyze product requirements and specifications to create, communicate, and implement & suggest the technical design. (Jira)
Decide which technologies are going to be used in the project and define the overall architecture and layouts.
Learn new technologies, languages, and techniques so that you are able to adapt to the requirements of the project.
Collaborate with other team members to define the internal processes and initiatives to help the company accomplish its mission.
Review the source code of other team members for evaluation and improvement.
K·ªπ nƒÉng & Chuy√™n m√¥n
eCommerce Development: Have experience developing eCommerce web applications using Magento, Shopify, and Salesforce.
Front-End Frameworks: More than 2 years of experience with modern frontend frameworks, with a preference for VueJS, but also skilled in ReactJS and Angular.
Technical Skills
Magento, Shopify and Salesforce Expertise: Proven ability to deliver high-quality eCommerce solution development with meticulous attention to detail.
Web Services & API: Strong knowledge of web services, including REST API and GraphQL implementation.
Database Management: Advanced understanding and experience with MySQL and MongoDB.
Linux Proficiency: Comfortable working in Linux operating systems.
Cloud Environments: Experience with cloud environments, particularly AWS (EC2, S3, ELB).
Development Skills
Web Development Process: In-depth understanding of the entire web development process from design to deployment.
Frontend Development: Solid experience with JavaScript and modern frontend frameworks, particularly VueJS.
Personal Attributes
Responsibility: Demonstrates strong accountability for personal work results, including time management, quality of work, and budget adherence, contributing to overall company success.
Communication: Fluent in English, ensuring clear and effective communication with team members and stakeholders.
Fluent English

Salary and bonus based on performance and experience
Good working place and tea, coffee break
